```{r}

#read data as dataframe

library(dplyr)
geneFile<-"D:\\Research with Kaplan\\DCF-2014\\CaseStudies\\NCI-gene\\nci60_RNA__Agilent_mRNA_log2.txt"
gene<-read.table(geneFile,head=TRUE )  

gene_df<-tbl_df(gene)

subgene<-select(gene_df,gene_df[,6:65])


#Use function apply to calculate variance of columns [6:65] by row

rowVar<-apply(subgene,1,var)  #rowVar is numeric


#Use function mutate in dplyr to add a "rowVar"" Column
newgene<-mutate(gene_df,rowVar)

#Use select in dplyr to select only "Probe" and "rowVar" column

newgene<-select(newgene,Probe,rowVar)
newgene<-arrange(newgene,desc(rowVar))

newsub<-head(newgene,10)
```
